metaTitle: EU Customs Calculator 2026 - Duty & VAT Impact Analysis
metaDescription: Calculate the impact of EU 2026 customs regulations on your imports. Get duty rates, handling surcharges, and VAT declaration modes before and after July 1st 2026.
pageSubtitle: Discover how the new EU customs regulations effective July 1st, 2026 will impact your import business
shippingCountryHint: Select the origin country of your shipment (non-EU countries only)
importCountryHint: Select the EU member state where goods are imported
orderValueHint: Enter the average value of your order in EUR
packageCountHint: How many packages in this order?
hsCodeCountHint: How many different product categories (HS codes)?
b2cEcommerce: Is this a B2C eCommerce transaction?
b2cHint: Business-to-Consumer eCommerce transactions may have different handling
handlingSurchargeCountriesNote: Handling surcharge currently applies only when goods are cleared in Italy and Romania. France will implement a surcharge from March 1, 2026.
disclaimerText: This calculator provides estimates based on standard EU tariff rates. Actual duty rates may vary depending on product classification, origin country agreements, and preferential trade arrangements. Please consult with customs experts for accurate rates.
fillForm: Fill in the form on the left to calculate the impact of EU 2026 customs regulations on your shipments
dutyExplanation: Import duties are taxes levied on goods entering the EU. They are calculated as a percentage of the goods' value. As of July 1st 2026, duty rates increase for most non-EU countries due to new EU customs regulations.
vatExplanation: Value Added Tax (VAT) is charged on imported goods. Current rules allow simplified procedures for low-value imports (under 150 EUR), where VAT is not declared. From July 1st 2026, VAT will be charged on all imports regardless of value.
deMinimisEcomText: Abolition of de-minimis: a fixed cost of 3 EUR per HS code will apply to B2C/eCommerce imports from July 1st 2026.
deMinimisOtherText: Abolition of de-minimis: standard customs duties will apply to all commercial orders regardless of value. For an exact duty estimate, please request a paid consultation.
consultationCTA: Request a paid consultation for a full duty estimate and classification support: /main/contact-us.html
